name: Cukedoctor
tagline: BDD living documentation using Cucumber and Asciidoctor
body:
# Cukedoctor documentation examples 

All documentations are generated based on cucumber json output files generated during tests. The json formatter can be activated using:

* cucumber features --format json --out reports **(Ruby)**
* @CucumberOptions(plugins = {"json:target/cucumber.json"} ) **(Java)**

Following is a list of some open source projects documentation generated by Cukedoctor. 

## Asciidoctor

* [Original cucumber html](asciidoctor/asciidoctor.html)
* [Cukedoctor html](asciidoctor/asciidoctor-documentation.html) 
* [Cukedoctor pdf](asciidoctor/asciidoctor-documentation.pdf) 
 

## Jekkyl

* [Original cucumber html](jekyll/asciidoctor.html)
* [Cukedoctor html](jekyll/asciidoctor-documentation.html) 
* [Cukedoctor pdf](jekkyl/asciidoctor-documentation.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
